pullRequest.title: Issue #7757: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - PackageAnnotation
pullRequest.bodyText:
Resolve #7757 : Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - PackageAnnotation
Diff report link : https://wilcoln.github.io/checkstyle-reports/7757/diff/index.html
The diff output is ok, with no new violation reported for all the projects.

nodes.bodyText: please add comment to explain why it is not compiled.
it is kind of strange that this file is not compilable because of annotation. Please share javac output for this file
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+//non-compiled with javac: non-compilable annotation, for testing
+@Deprecated
+package org.checkstyle.suppressionxpathfilter.packageannotation; // warn

nodes.bodyText:
can we add one more  test ? (all others have two tests at least)
I know that there is not that much options, for example with two annotations, or annotation on the same line at least.

nodes.bodyText:
there is no reason to work on non-compilable files, we do not support this.
please create package-info.java and do validation on it
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+//non-compiled with javac: non-compilable annotation, should be in file package-info.java
+@Deprecated
+package org.checkstyle.suppressionxpathfilter.packageannotation; // warn

nodes.bodyText:
please create one more package-info.java and do validation on it.
all should be compilable. you can create as much packages as we need in Input folder.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+//non-compiled with javac: non-compilable annotation, should be in file package-info.java
+@Deprecated
+@SuppressWarnings
